item.title: Election Noise Pollution: Politicians' Fireworks Anger Navi Mumbaikars

blockquote.p: TLDR: Politicians are blasting music and setting off fireworks for the election, despite the already terrible air quality. Are they actually trying to make us hate them?

description.p: The election season's here, and with it, the return of the politicians' favorite hobby: annoying everyone. According to a Reddit post on r/NaviMumbai, the politicians are not just blasting music, but setting off firecrackers too. This is happening despite the fact that the AQ...
